metadata.title: CVE-2021-34119 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was discovered in htmodoc 1.9.12 in function parse_paragraph in ps-pdf.cxx ,this flaw possibly allows possible code execution and a denial of service via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
